page.title: 18Clubs and Societies
page.content: {Cubs Cubs meet at the Community Centre each Tuesday from 6.30p.m.to 8.30 p.m.There are 8 members of the pack at present. The group performs tasks for badges, makes things and plays games. {21 Club A group of 21 women meet fortnightly on Tuesdays at 7.30p.m. THe group is a social and charitable one. {Karate Club This meets on Tuesday and Friday at 5p.m. This is sports club. {Popmobility This group meets each Wednesday at 7.30p.m. The object is keeping fit to music. {The Youth Club This meets each Monday and Thursday. {Senior Citizens Club This group meets each Tuesday from 1.30p.m.to 3.00p.m.
